description: Basic V-Model example for a standard web application

inputs.projectRequirements:
Build a task management web application with the following features:

1. User Authentication
   - Users can register with email and password
   - Users can log in and log out
   - Password reset via email

2. Task Management
   - Create tasks with title, description, due date, and priority
   - Edit existing tasks
   - Mark tasks as complete
   - Delete tasks
   - Filter tasks by status (all, active, completed)
   - Sort tasks by due date or priority

3. Task Lists/Projects
   - Organize tasks into projects
   - Create, edit, and delete projects
   - View all tasks in a project

4. User Interface
   - Responsive design for desktop and mobile
   - Clean, intuitive interface
   - Real-time updates

5. Non-Functional Requirements
   - Page load time < 2 seconds
   - Support 100 concurrent users
   - 99.5% uptime
   - Data encrypted in transit and at rest

learningPoints: Standard V-Model flow for web applications
Parallel test design at each level
Testing pyramid: Unit → Integration → System → Acceptance
